title: Sydney .NET User Group - May
sessionTitle: Visual Studio and Telerik Platform: Mobile App Development Awesomesauce
eventDescription:
​Are you using Visual Studio? Of course you are. Are you wanting to build mobile apps? Of course you do. In this session, John Bristowe will show you the “peanut butter and chocolate” combination that is Visual Studio and Telerik Platform to build amazing mobile apps that cross-cut multiple platforms. Impress your friends! Inspire your co-workers! And, best of all, become the hero you were born to be! 

Join John and your fellow members of the Sydney .NET User Group for this action-packed adventure through mobile app development hyperspace.

About the speaker: 
John Bristowe (@JohnBristowe) is Principal Developer Advocate for Telerik. He likes long walks on the beach. He also likes helping developers be awesome. When he’s not building apps or writing docs, you’ll find him tweeting GIFs for the lulz.
